input.activity_signal: Company was acquired by Fusion CX in May 2022 according to web search results, which indicates it no longer operates as an independent entity. FCC filing was from 2021-05-07 with no recent activity. LinkedIn profile shows "(A Fusion CX Company)" indicating the acquisition. No independent web presence or recent company activity found.
input.product_summary: Boomsourcing was a call center outsourcing company that provided voice and non-voice customer engagement services using proprietary "Perfect Pitch Technology" - a patented hosted call center suite integrating scripted audio into live agent conversations.
